ProductInfo.Features:
This unlocked cell phone is compatible with GSM carriers like AT&T; and T-Mobile. Not all carrier features may be supported. It will not work with CDMA carriers like Verizon Wireless, Alltel and Sprint.
Quad-Band Unlocked GSM cell phone compatible with 850/900/1800/1900 and Euro 3G 900/2100 frequencies plus GPRS/EDGE capabilities.
Full QWERTY slider, Full touchscreen display, Display with 240 x 400, Accelerometer sensor for auto-rotate, FM Radio,
3.15 MP camera (2048x1536 pixels), Supports MicroSD (TransFlash) up to 16GB, Bluetooth (A2DP Ver. 2.0), MP3/MP4/AAC/AAC+/EAAC+/WMA player, MP4 player, Document viewer (DOC, XLS, PPT, PDF)
Up to 5 hours of talk time, Up to 500 hours of standby time.
ProductInfo.Name: LG GW525 Calisto GSM Unlocked Phone with Camera--International Version with Warranty (Aqua Blue)
